thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn New York Long Island City / Manhattan View - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Home away from home
thread.title_full: Home away from home - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York Long Island City / Manhattan View, Long Island City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Dave W
title: Home away from home
text:
This was my second stay at this hotel, and this was the second time I was able to check in early (9AM this time). Erin and Francis are excellent front desk hosts. Waiting area is comfortable and chat-friendly. Gym is well-appointed.
The Queens Plaza subway station is a block from the hotel, so most parts of Queens, Manhattan, and Brooklyn are a short commute away.
The only drawbacks are the views in some rooms (pretty only to a native New Yorker, and maybe not even then) and the smaller than average rooms.
